:Dark Rodimus::
> =A0
> As Rodimus remains behind the heavy desk the Minion=
 weapons fire strikes the wall behind him and the desk.
> =A0
> Rodimus get=
s Hydras' message over the commlink. He makes a mental note to get right on=
 that when he was done here.
> =A0
> When he finds his opening Rodimus pops=
 up and fires his wrist mounts in rapid fire. The energy blasts cover a wid=
e area with a strafing motion.
> =A0
> The tactics, aggression and firepowe=
r of Rodimus should be quite the surprise for Scourge and the Minions as th=
ey think Rodimus is an Autobot.

Scourge was indeed taken aback by the fero=
sity of Rodimus' attack. For while he knew that Rodimus was different from =
the extensive reports from Nightrazor's download of this warrior. Seeing it=
 in action was a whole different thing!

The attack from Rodimus was strong=
 enough and agrresive enough to pin both he and the sweep with him behind t=
heir cover.

Then a small blushish purple ball sails through the air, follo=
wed quickly by another, lobbed from Scourge, position.

They bounced and la=
nded near Rodimus' position,  small pulsing lights at their core. Their fun=
ction and goal are obvious as the twin fusion grenades count off their last=
 second or two before detonation!

Preston 
(Scourge & Sweeps)
